{"id":391174342,"lang":"cpp","lang_name":"C++","time":"3 years","timestamp":1599278806,"status":10,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"0 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/391174342/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Pow(x, n)","memory":"6.2 MB","code":"// recursion\nclass Solution {\n    \npublic:\n    double myPow(double x, int n) {\n        if (n == 0) return 1;\n        double ret = 1;\n        if (n % 2) {\n            ret *= n < 0 ? 1/x : x;  //这里还挺巧妙的\n        }\n        double half = myPow(x, n/2);\n        ret *=  half * half;\n        return ret;\n    }\n};","compare_result":"","title_slug":"powx-n","has_notes":false,"flag_type":1}
